title: How to Make Gluten Free Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins

steps.headline: Mix the coconut flour, salt, and baking soda in a medium mixing bowl.
Blend eggs, agave, oil and lemon zest in a large mixing bowl.
Blend all the dry ingredients into the wet ones.
Fold in the poppy seeds using a rubber spatula.
Spoon one tablespoon of the batter into each greased muffin cup.
Bake in a preheated 350°F (176°C) oven  for 8 - 10 minutes.

text: Mix the coconut flour, salt, and baking soda in a medium mixing bowl.  Blend eggs, agave, oil and lemon zest in a large mixing bowl.  Blend all the dry ingredients into the wet ones.  Fold in the poppy seeds using a rubber spatula.  Spoon one tablespoon of the batter into each greased muffin cup.  Bake in a preheated 350°F (176°C) oven  for 8 - 10 minutes.  Cool and serve.
